hero.title: Our Creation is Born from Love
hero.description: We believe that every individual deserves to present their best self. We're here to help them find and showcase their inner light.

cards.sectionDescription: We aspire to create a world where people can present themselves with confidence and inspiration.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We believe everyone can unlock their potential by presenting themselves correctly.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To create tools that empower personal branding and growth.

team.sectionDescription: A small but passionate group dedicated to building empowering tools for personal branding.

members.name: Hovhannes Khachatryan
members.description: The mind and heart behind Frame Generator. Loves clean code, inspiring design, and impactful ideas.

members.name: Gayane Harutyunyan
members.description: Crafts words that resonate and connect. Passionate about branding and meaningful communication.

members.name: Ani Mkrtchyan
members.description: Shapes the look and feel of Frame Generator. Believes in the power of aesthetics and clarity.
